prompts.name: List SSH Keys
prompts.text: Show me the SSH keys available on this system.

prompts.name: Create Simple Inventory
prompts.text: Create a simple inventory file with two web servers at 192.168.1.10 and 192.168.1.11 in a group called 'webservers', and a database server at 192.168.1.20 in a group called 'dbservers'. Make the inventory saved as 'simple_app.yml'.

prompts.name: Create Basic Playbook
prompts.text: Create a basic playbook that installs nginx on all webservers and ensures it's running. Save it as 'install_nginx.yml'.

prompts.name: Run Ad-Hoc Command
prompts.text: Run an ad-hoc command to check disk space usage (df -h) on all hosts in the inventory called 'simple_app.yml'.

prompts.name: Load and Modify Playbook
prompts.text: Load the 'install_nginx.yml' playbook and add a task to set the firewall to allow HTTP and HTTPS traffic.

prompts.name: Create Complex Playbook
prompts.text: Create a playbook called 'setup_app.yml' that does the following: 1) Install required packages on webservers (nginx, python3, git), 2) Clone a git repo to /var/www/app, 3) Set up a systemd service for the app, 4) Configure nginx to proxy to the application.
